title: Municipal Sweeper Truck DTMS-5000
description: The DTMS-5000 municipal Sweeper Truck represents the pinnacle of high-capacity road sweep technology. A powerful diesel engine powers it, it's designed to offer the highest cleaning coverage, outstanding suction power, and constant high-performance for industrial and urban settings. With extra-wide sweeping arms, a high-tech vacuum system with integrated water spray jets, and an enormous waste hopper, the DTMS-5000 provides high efficiency in dust and debris collection using only a few runs. With its comfortable cabin for the operator, an integrated litter picker, as well as an intelligent control panel, the DTMS-5000 provides unbeatable convenience and efficiency. Ideal for big campuses, city roads, and smart city projects, it creates an entirely new standard for street cleaning for municipal roads.
keyFeatures: High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – 500L water and 5000L dust collection for extended operation.
Powerful Performance – Best performance in heavy-duty sweeping operations, as it utilizes high torque from the diesel engines.
Long Operating Range – Able to run for several hours continuously without frequent refuels.
Integrated Litter Picker – Enhanced efficiency along edges and corners of curbs for the easy collection of larger forms of litter such as wrappers and bottles.
High Suction Capacity – Efficiently lifts dust, gravel, leaves, and plastic litter from roads.
Large Waste Hopper – Less operational pauses bringing increased efficiency by decreasing the need for frequent unloads.
Strong Water Spraying System – Improves cleaning quality by reducing airborne dust while cleaning.
Tough Conditions Are No Problem – Functions properly in any weather or terrain.
Best For City Use – Best suited for major roads, urban roads, and large industrial cities.
